name: DyWorld
title: DyWorld
author: Dysoch
description: DyWorld, the successor of DyTech. Adding new systems, items, fluids, machines and enemies!!!! The Metal system gives items like pipes and transport a real life feeling (metal property specific capacity/speed/range) and the metallurgic system gives a new way to smelt ores. The Attribute system governs you! This means whatever you do, you get stronger from it!
